hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Razin said:"I saw Abu Hurairah clap his hand to his forehead and say: 'O people of Al-'Iraq, you claim that I tell lies about the Messenger of Allah [SAW]. I bear witness that I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say: If the strap of the sandal of one of you breaks, let him not walk in the other until he fixes it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْمَشْىِ، فِي نَعْلٍ وَاحِدَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Walking in One Sandal
